mapper.select: SELECT A.ReviewID, A.ItemID, A.CustomerID, A.ReviewText, B.ItemCode, B.ItemShortDescriptionCN, B.ItemShortDescriptionEN, C.Cellphone, C.CustomerName, A.ReviewLevel, (CASE A.ReviewLevel WHEN 'G' THEN '好评' WHEN 'N' THEN '中评' WHEN 'B' THEN '差评' END) AS ReviewLevelText, A.ReviewStatus, (CASE A.ReviewStatus WHEN 'I' THEN '待审核' WHEN 'P' THEN '审核通过' WHEN 'N' THEN '审核未通过' END) AS ReviewStatusText, A.InUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.InDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS InDate, A.LastEditUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.LastEditDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LastEditDate FROM CustomerReview A INNER JOIN Item B ON A.ItemID = B.ItemID INNER JOIN Customer C ON A.CustomerID = C.CustomerID ORDER BY A.InDate DESC LIMIT #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT A.ReviewID, A.ItemID, A.CustomerID, A.ReviewText, B.ItemCode, B.ItemShortDescriptionCN, B.ItemShortDescriptionEN, C.Cellphone, C.CustomerName, A.ReviewLevel, (CASE A.ReviewLevel WHEN 'G' THEN '好评' WHEN 'N' THEN '中评' WHEN 'B' THEN '差评' END) AS ReviewLevelText, A.ReviewStatus, (CASE A.ReviewStatus WHEN 'I' THEN '待审核' WHEN 'P' THEN '审核通过' WHEN 'N' THEN '审核未通过' END) AS ReviewStatusText, A.InUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.InDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS InDate, A.LastEditUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.LastEditDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LastEditDate FROM CustomerReview A INNER JOIN Item B ON A.ItemID = B.ItemID INNER JOIN Customer C ON A.CustomerID = C.CustomerID WHERE A.CustomerID = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND A.ItemID = #{arg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ReviewLevel = #{arg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ReviewStatus = #{arg3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.InDate DESC
